message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $13,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, even more so than that price. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at that price?
